answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Tracy, 
Thank you for your question on budget increases. On the Knowledge Network we have many budget development guidelines and instructions which may help you answer your question. The city of Charlottesville's Budget Guidelines covers on page 6 how they consider new expenditures icma.org/Documents/QuestionAnswer/Document/7351
you may also find "A Budgeting Guide for Local Government" useful as they discuss departmental budgets and changes http://bookstore.icma.org/FreeDocs/Excel_Exercise_1_Instructions.pdf
I hope these resources are of use to you in answering your question. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Monica Gutierrez
text: The City of Tracy is researching options to improve our budget augmentation process.  Do any municipalities have sample policy, set criteria or parameters given to Dept. Leadership to use as a guide when requesting augmentations?  Additionally, is there any evaluation models or best practices used to rank the augmentation requests?
title: Criteria for Budget Augmentations
